      • getmaneuver

        protected abstract CombatExpertiseManeuver getmaneuver()

      • add

        public boolean add​(Combatant c)
        Description copied from class: Feat
        This will be called when a Monster is being made into a Combatant. It is also called after upgrades when the Feat.update flag is set. Can be called multiple times if a monster has more than one feat of the same type as allowed by Feat.stack. Note that many feats do not have to implement this as the stat block itself will have the changes pre-computated in it. For example: Toughness and ImprovedInitiative only need to implement Feat.upgrade(Combatant).
        Overrides:
        add in class Feat
        Returns:
        true in case of success.
